name: BeSwitched Magic Puzzle Match
description:
Lily the Little Witch needs your help, the Evil Warlock has cast a spell on Lily’s castle and left it in ruins. Adventure across the lands solving match 3 puzzles to restore the magical castle and rescue Lily’s charming friends from the Warlock’s curse. As you continue on the adventure with Lily, be careful! Don’t let the Evil Warlock get in your way.

Play tons of levels!
• Play over 200 levels full of new challenges
• Free Lily’s friends from the curse of Evil Warlock by defeating him in Battle and unlock new secrets as you go

Match to unlock a magical world
• Earn keys to discover new areas of the Castle
• The Castle is full of secrets, there may even be a dragon hiding in it

Raise a Baby Dragon
• Bring home a Baby Dragon to raise
• Get rewards as you help it grow and evolve

Battle the Evil Warlock
• Power up your spells to send him on his way
• Use your spells to attack the Warlock and defend the innocent creatures across the lands to free them from the Evil Warlock’s curse

Decorate the castle
• Repair, restore, and decorate the castle garden and rooms
• Choose from tons of fun furniture and decor to make the castle your own

Collect outfits as you go
• Lily has her own wardrobe, which will be expanding all the time
• Choose from lots of fun new outfits

Discover the secrets of the Castle!
• Unlock the Card Room to earn rewards every day
• The Grandma Spider is there to leave prizes for you in the castle

Let us know what you would like to see and make sure to keep checking in! Soon you will be able to visit your friend’s castles to get presents and help them on their way.

Lily needs your help to solve match 3 puzzles in this addictive new game! Help her out and make her home the castle of your dreams!
